/usr/bin/c++    -Wall -Wextra -Wformat-security -Wvla -Woverloaded-virtual -Wno-unused-parameter -O2 -fabi-version=2 -fno-omit-frame-pointer -fno-strict-aliasing -DDBUG_OFF    CMakeFiles/mysql_upgrade.dir/mysql_upgrade.c.o  -o mysql_upgrade  -lpthread ../libmysql/libperconaserverclient.a -lpthread -lm -lrt -ldl
